channel.title: SPECIALS(refilling)
channel.description:
ok lol im an idiot...
i need codes for special refilling
-story- ok well i moved to a new base, 2 fix tons of glitches, apparently i just found out that the special dont refill, the only way 2 recharge specials is 2 log out then in, at first i thought it was just a joke, i just tested it, BAM they dont recharge.... -end story-
make a small tut or give me the codes please
REP++ IM THAT DESPERATE!!!!
im not sure but i think its just some codes in process? it has working specs i just need the refilling part...
PLEASE AND THANK YOU

item.title: SPECIALS(refilling)
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

sickamore didn’t work, i added the voids then added

getRefill();

into process, idk if thats correct

maybe i need to add specBar++; and specialRestoreTimer–; into server.java…

EDIT: didn’t work

Read full topic

item.title: SPECIALS(refilling)
item.dc:creator: @sickamore sickamore
item.description:
@sickamore wrote:

public int specialRestoreTimer; public int specBar = 10; public void getRefill() { if (specialRestoreTimer == 0 && specBar < 10) { specialRestoreTimer = 120; specBar++; } if(specialRestoreTimer > 0) specialRestoreTimer--; }
I have this in mine… so try it out

Read full topic
